content.text:
ðŸ¥‘

I had some really nice chats with [@cel](@f/6sQ6d2CMxRUhLpspgGIulDxDCwYD7DzFzPNr7u5AU=.ed25519) and [@nanomonkey](@+D0ku/LReK6kqd3PSrcVCfbLYbDtTmS4Bd21rqhpYNA=.ed25519), but we ran into two problems.

1. **The other members were inactive.** I found the messages where they said "I want to be in a ring" but by the time the rings started they hadn't been on Scuttlebutt in a while.
2. **We weren't consistent.** We had a problem where we often forgot that there was a ring or we'd log in and nobody else was online. [@cel](@f/6sQ6d2CMxRUhLpspgGIulDxDCwYD7DzFzPNr7u5AU=.ed25519) made a reminder bot that worked one week but then it stopped posting. I think we had two meetings where we were all online for the whole call.

I don't know whether the first problem caused the second problem, but it felt like more like a once-in-a-while conference call with 1-2 friends rather than a regular gathering of ~6 people in a faerie ring.
